documents.document: @Ilaeria I can fully endorse that. HAS TO BE BROKEN APART!
Achievements unlocked today: proficiency in sendmail, mail, mailx and the differences between echo and printf.
I'm pretty sure they must be thinking "WTF is this place and why am I suited/dressed up like a business clown?" :-)
External accountant team at my client this week. While I'm not wearing shoes & most others flip flops or beach shorts, they're in suits.
@bexquilliam She would fit well into the lawyer-and-other-legal-people line that you and your brother have broken! :)
@Neurotic I think your only option (if you want to stay long term) is getting citizenship there.
@Neurotic If your desk it full of carrot bit, I don't care. If the podcast is full of you chewing sounds - BOOOO! :)
Do we know yet what the story with access to other country eshops on a JP-import Nintendo #Switch will be like?
Why doesn't it surprise me that Lufthansa Technik has something for the #PaxEx of falcons: https://t.co/IhD2DtHM6p :-)
@nicktmro @mogest Ideally, you'd only look among Germans - no need for over-complicating politeness here :)
@nicktmro @mogest I find - very generalised, I know - that there are more of those people in AU than in NZ.
I'd even have a few ideas for guest for a VR topic, @Neurotic!
We should totally do a VR podcast episode, @Neurotic! And how's that editing of last week's recording going? <ducking under the table> :)
@Ilaeria Ridiculous, I KNOW
@nicktmro I'm trying that for 42+ yrs now. Pretty much failing every day :)
@Ilaeria "Finally"? :) It makes it sound as if I slacked off and did *not* bring it on all my other previous AU trips this year :-)
@MiramarMike But ha - you can't get the Pixel in NZ either, right? So, I guess it all makes sense from a weird Google point of view.
@MiramarMike I had mine shipped to a friend here in AU and I'll bring it back home.
@markdrew @d1rtym0nk3y Lesson *cough* learned *cough cough*
Spent ~1hr with the Daydream and I have to say that provided you have a compatible phone, it's awesome value for money (119AU$).
@d1rtym0nk3y @markdrew Not commercial grade - just wanted an easy quick setup for a local-ish mail server to test a bunch of things. Yeah...
@markdrew Not sure, I expected it to tell me what it'd be doing. I really just wanted a mail server :)
...the hard way.
Today I learned that installing macOS Server on a Mac *really* fucks up all your nicely configured Apache setup.
@tmpst_ What have I missed? :-(
@jethrocarr They're ridiculous, aren't they. And always having flash, new phones and VR stuff and godknowswhatmoderncrap :-)
numOfMacsInMyPossession=numOfMacsInMyPossession-2 - yay, back to only lugging my 13MBP around with me.
@mgouline it looks like. I wonder if they were out of holding fuel when SG286 was sorted out.
Oh, EK406 hat a nice side-trip to Ohakea today?
Appt I'm staying at has 3rd party-brand Nespresso machine. Should I even try capsules labelled with 1 and 3 or straight away gor for 6+? :)
@dasme Yeah, absolutely. Now that I also found out that there's a google cal with recording times (duh me! :), might join the Twitch stream.
Current status: travelling with 3 macs, 3 phones, a tablet and a game console. I'm an idiot, at least some of it stays here in AU :)
@webbyfrost that has happened about a week ago. You're not following :)
@yakmoose yes, discussed that with @webbyfrost this morning at 4am. Pence is evil, but not "I don't like your tweet, here's a nuke" crazy.
I wonder what happens first in the US: civil war or the CIA assassinating Trump to prevent that from happening.
@smamol Never been, but potentially interesting. I think I'd prefer Canada though, haven't been there since 2005.
One of the flight attendants is clearly Scottish. He made all the while-boarding announcements and the AU Pax all have a WTF face on :)
OH: purser on QF868 - "Welcome back Mrs..<long stunned pause>... Meow?" ðŸ˜‚
I will not even consider submitting any topics for US-based conferences in the future. Go and move it to Canada or somewhere else.
@dasme it was on my to-do list for weeks. Now I finally found the time to do it :)
If you're after an awesome Nintendo podcast, listen to: @NintendoPulse. And support them through Patreon while you're at it!
It took me way to long to join the @NintendoPulse Patreon, they've given me entertainment in the dimensions of 100+ hours.
I disagree with a lot of the policies of @PeterDunneMP, but his open letter to Trump is top-notch: https://t.co/Sh7nNjGKkr
@traskjd Can you let me know when you've got a solution and share it with me, thx! :-/
@IanTLS @stevebiddle @Qantas They're just not used to proper coffee (and proper internet) :)
@IanTLS @stevebiddle @Qantas Ha, I'm miles ahead of you. Obviously outside of Wellington I always ask for a double shot :)
@ctrlaltjustine A slightly belated Happy Birthday from New Zea....ehhhh, just landed in Australia :)
@stevebiddle To be fair though, the espresso macchiato I just got from the @Qantas SYD J lounge barista was excellent. #PaxEx
@stevebiddle Oh, so @Qantas delivers a true NBN experience in their Wellington lounge? :) Yes, that makes sense now #PaxEx
If Futurama was still around, I'd love to see their Trump head in the gallery of ex-presidents.
So, Theresa May seems to enjoy hanging out with loonies. First Trump, then Erdogan. Aaaaand there goes the UK.
Most countries being considered 3rd world by westerners have way faster internet than this. #ttrtpt
First flight of 2017 and the Wifi at @Qantas lounge Wellington is still providing 4th world speeds. https://t.co/wmK0TTJffo
Hey board gamers in Wellington and NZ, I'm selling a bunch of my board games: https://t.co/UnibqC4cyr Some rare classics among them!
@flying_geek Yeah, I heard that. Also that if I'm listening to music on my headphones with my phone somewhere hidden that no one cares :)

@stevebiddle What is/was fake about it?

@DaveHogue The gondolas or the screenshot? :) The gondolas: no. The screenhot: yes and I have no idea what Google thinks it's doing here :)
@Ilaeria I don't know what they are to be honest. 3, 3W, 17, 18 etc. are the Karori busses.
Look at all the regular Gondola Lift services Karori now has. https://t.co/lL6gmRUOQZ

I take it that @MattNippert and others will OIA the shit out of the NZ government re how Thiel became a citizen here.
1st time ever me agreeing with Winston Peters, "...questioned decision, & accused government of "selling citizenship" to rich foreigners."
@kb Then re-consider wearing shoes :)

@stevebiddle Yeah but that's still 4k o/w. And then? I'm testing CZ to JP soon, if good I'll consider them to Europe in the future.
Is it just me or is pretty much every Android 3rd party camera app returning their own, slightly different variation of Intent? FFS!

@parsley72 You wouldn't expect anything else from a National government.

I'm seriously annoyed that someone gave Peter Thiel NZ citizenship.
@sowmyasguru I will be at Droidcon DE again though this year :)
@MattNippert I had to be a permanent resident for 5 years before I could apply for citizenship. Funny how NZ sells it to rich people.

@sowmyasguru Does this "Woo hoo" mean you're coming, too? :-) @DroidKaigi

Registered for @DroidKaigi. Going to Japan, Yay!!!
@flying_geek Took a bit of emailing back and forth, but sorted now.
@flying_geek their normal link, but to allow you to get a password-change link via email it requires lots of verification, incl. passport.

@southofshasta ehhm, good question. At this stage prob no, unless @nicktmro or @Mistyepd have an idea of how to do at he venue.
@flying_geek I have a KLM/Air France account, but I know zilch about Sky Team programs.
@flying_geek So, in a nutshell: I'm stuck :)
@flying_geek It didn't go. I've signed up but they didn't give me a password. Reset pw sends verification code to my phone - never arrived.
